item.title: By: EverythingAboutFacebook
item.dc:creator: EverythingAboutFacebook
item.description: You may find more and more Wordpress plugins for Facebook coming up. I am using the "Share with Facebook" plugin and it does bring me some traffic.
item.content:encoded: You may find more and more WordPress plugins for Facebook coming up. I am using the “Share with Facebook” plugin and it does bring me some traffic.

item.title: By: kory
item.dc:creator: kory
item.description: facebook is growing fast, in general the future of communication is in control of the social mobile networks. Their growing past each one attaacts a different audience, peekamo hit their audience on a more persoanl level through text, facebook is hitting everyone through pics, groups. Networking is now a business itself.

item.title: By: Trent
item.dc:creator: Trent
item.description: Sorry about my announcement way too early there Joseph! I was just so impressed! You did a great job on this one and look forward to your work in the future!
item.content:encoded: Sorry about my announcement way too early there Joseph! I was just so impressed! You did a great job on this one and look forward to your work in the future!
